title: My Match History Wont Show Up
body: I want get some past replays but everytime I click on (Full Match History) on my client, the interent pop up page that it takes me to is blank. I tried signing in and trying to open up my full match history but its still blank.

replies.body:
You actually can't view replays that aren't in you match history, so this wouldn't be possible. 

If you still want help sorting out the match history webpage issues, I recommend [**clearing your browser data**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to ensure there aren't any issues in your cache.

Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=avHLoek3,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-02-22T23:19:28.832+0000)
>
> You actually can't view replays that aren't in you match history, so this wouldn't be possible. 
> 
> If you still want help sorting out the match history webpage issues, I recommend [**clearing your browser data**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to ensure there aren't any issues in your cache.
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions,
I cant see any of my past matches which I was able to do before, and I tried clearing the browser data didnt work. I thoguth you Riot said that all past replays were coming back so we could see them. Its been a while now?

I haven't seen any announcement or mention of intending to bring all past matches to the Replay System. Can you provide me a source on this so I can look into it?

As for the issue with loading up the webpage, try using a VPN such as [**Cyberghost**](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/en_us) or [**Hotspot Shield**](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) before trying to access the page again. This may resolve a routing issue if one was preventing you from reaching the page. Let me know if this worked.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=avHLoek3,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-02-23T21:46:53.484+0000)
>
> I haven't seen any announcement or mention of intending to bring all past matches to the Replay System. Can you provide me a source on this so I can look into it?
> 
> As for the issue with loading up the webpage, try using a VPN such as [**Cyberghost**](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/en_us) or [**Hotspot Shield**](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) before trying to access the page again. This may resolve a routing issue if one was preventing you from reaching the page. Let me know if this worked.

Wait so your saying that once a match leaves my match history, even after the new client was released, i can never get them backk???
I think there may be some confusion from both sides here. Are you intending to simply view your previous match history stats, or are you trying to view the entire matches through the replay system?

Same man, I wanted to start making a montage and a youtube channel today, all hyped up and everything then it doesnt work. The page loads but its a just a border with empty white space in it. :( RIP that sucks for both of us
{{champion:238}}
